p: Finally, we examined the essential oil profile from fruits. Twenty-one different compounds were found in total, with 1,8-cineole ( 13) (40.2%), α-terpineol ( 22) (22.0%) and sabinene ( 4) (11.7%) as the major ones. All these compounds were already detected in the essential oils from all the other analyzed plant parts. Three exclusive compounds occurred in this sample: safrole ( 25) (5.1%), ( E)- β-ocimene ( 15) (0.4%), and carvone ( 24) (0.1%).
